parameter.name: isDone
parameter.description: Indicates whether the activity is done or not.

parameter.name: dueDate
parameter.description: Due date of the activity, Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameter.name: dueTime
parameter.description: Due time of the activity in UTC, Format: HH:MM

parameter.name: duration
parameter.description: The duration of the activity, Format: HH:MM

parameter.name: userId
parameter.description: The unique identifier of the user whom the activity will be assigned to.

parameter.name: dealId
parameter.description: The unique identifier of the deal the activity will be associated with.

parameter.name: personId
parameter.description: The unique identifier of the person the activity will be associated with.

parameter.name: organizationId
parameter.description: The unique identifier of the organization the activity will be associated with.

parameter.name: note
parameter.description: The note of the activity in HTML format.

parameter.name: prettyOutput
parameter.description: If the prettyOutput is specified as 1, will return an indented response of the output.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The array of fileds to be returned in the output.
